ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a collection of feature-rich plugins for Ktor, a Kotlin multiplatform framework. These plugins enhance Ktor servers and clients with functionalities such as Kafka integration, task scheduling, rate limiting, and circuit breaking. The plugins aim to simplify development and improve the reliability and scalability of Ktor applications.
